data.title: Bitcoin ETFs Hit by $235M Outflow Amid Global Tariff Turmoil
data.description:
Bitcoin ETFs saw a sharp reversal on February 3, with a $235 million net outflow, breaking a four-day streak of inflows that had seen a total of $1 billion.
The post Bitcoin ETFs Hit by $235M Outflow Amid Global Tariff Turmoil appeared first on Cryptodnes.
source: https://cryptodnes.bg/en/bitcoin-etfs-hit-by-235m-outflow-amid-global-tariff-turmoil/

data.title: El Salvador Buys the Bitcoin Dip, Snaps Up Further 11 BTC
data.description:
The Central American country snapped up another 11 Bitcoin for its national reserve as crypto prices slumped this week.
source: https://decrypt.co/304336/el-salvador-buys-the-bitcoin-dip

data.title: Taproot Wizards raises $30 million to expand OP_CAT functionality on Bitcoin
data.description:
The round was led by early Taproot Wizards supporter Standard Crypto, with participation from Cyberfund, Collider Ventures, among others.
source: https://www.theblock.co/post/338805/taproot-wizards-raises-30-million-to-expand-op_cat-functionality-on-bitcoin?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss

data.title: NASDAQ-Listed Company Announces $88 Million Bitcoin (BTC) Purchase
data.description:
NASDAQ-listed Semler Scientific spends $88 million on Bitcoin, Michael Saylor cosigns
source: https://u.today/nasdaq-listed-company-announces-88-million-bitcoin-btc-purchase

data.title: PayPal Announces $15 Billion Share Buyback Amidst 9% Stock Decline
data.description:
PayPal exceeded fourth-quarter financial expectations but faced a share decline due to concerns over slowing card processing growth.
The post PayPal Announces $15 Billion Share Buyback Amidst 9% Stock Decline appeared first on Tokenist.
source: https://tokenist.com/paypal-announces-15-billion-share-buyback-amidst-9-stock-decline/?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=paypal-announces-15-billion-share-buyback-amidst-9-stock-decline

data.description:

data.title: Hidden Crypto Market Liquidations May Have Erased $10B Overnight
data.description:
Crypto markets faced a historic liquidation event this weekend, with losses potentially reaching $8 billion to $10 billion—far exceeding the $2.3 billion initially reported by tracking platforms. Bybit founder and CEO Ben Zhou revealed the discrepancy in a Feb 3post on X(formerly Twitter), citing API limitations that obscured the full scale of the sell-off. Bybit […]
The post Hidden Crypto...
source: https://www.thecoinrepublic.com/2025/02/04/hidden-crypto-market-liquidations-may-have-erased-10b-overnight/

data.title: Satoshi-Era Bitcoin Miner Moves $5 Million BTC Earned When the Price Was Just 10 Cents
data.description:
Thanks for Bitcoin price action in recent months, the Bitcoin went from being worth $5 to approximately $5 million over 15 years.
source: https://decrypt.co/304329/satoshi-era-bitcoin-miner-5-million-btc

data.title: Helium Mobile Launches Free Wireless Plan—Here’s How to Get It
data.description:
TL;DR Helium Mobile introduces a free monthly plan offering 3GB of data, 100 minutes of calls, and 300 text messages, with upgrade options. The free plan comes with notifications to alert users of data usage and options to purchase more or switch to other plans with no commitments. With T-Mobile coverage and its network of ... 
source: https://crypto-economy.com/helium-mobile-launches-free-wireless-plan-heres-how-to-get-it/

data.title: Berachain to announce token economics tomorrow, token TGE on February 6
data.description: According to official news, the Berachain token TGE will be carried out simultaneously with the mainnet launch, and the token economics and airdrop checker will be launched tomorrow.
